price: Şimdi mi? Sen, önceden isyan etmiş ve bozgunculardan olmuştun!
arabic: ءَآلۡـَٰٔنَ وَقَدۡ عَصَيۡتَ قَبۡلُ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: āl'āna waqad ʿaṣayta qablu wakunta mina al-muf'sidīna
